issues.title: [CONTENT] Update Homepage Hero to Reflect Polymath Positioning
issues.body:
## Problem

Homepage hero positions Kris primarily as "event photographer" when he's actually Executive Director of BC+AI (2,000+ members), CTO of Indigenomics.ai, and Co-founder of The Upgrade AI.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Critical brand positioning issue
- Misrepresents actual work and influence
- Fails to convey thought leadership

## New Positioning (Approved)

"Bridging art, AI, Indigenous wisdom, and justice. Executive Director of BC+AI. CTO of Indigenomics.ai. Co-founder of The Upgrade AI. 20+ years creating technology that serves communities."

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Hero features three roles equally (BC+AI, Indigenomics, The Upgrade AI)
- [ ] Impact metrics displayed (2,000+ members, $200B discovery, Fortune 500 training)
- [ ] Professional but warm tone
- [ ] Roles positioned as interconnected
- [ ] Clear CTAs to each initiative
- [ ] Mobile responsive 320px+
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
- [ ] Load time < 2 seconds
